My Learning Journey

I believe in the "Ï€-shaped" developer model: broad knowledge of systems combined with deep expertise in specific crafts. This is my map.

The Horizontal Bar: My "Systems" Exploration

This is the curiosity that drives me. I explore the "why" and the "environment" that our code lives in.

Systems Architecture Networking Fundamentals Local-First & PWA Observability (Logging & Metrics) Containerization (Docker) CI/CD Automation Modern Auth (WebAuthn) Performance Optimization

The Vertical Legs: My "Craftsman" Focus

This is my current curriculum. I'm taking a focused pause to build deep, foundational expertise in these specific areas.

  • Advanced JavaScript & TypeScript: Mastering the language from the ground up, including asynchronous patterns, memory management, and the event loop.
  • Data Structures & Algorithms: Moving beyond "vibe-architecting" to write code that is provably efficient and correct.
  • Production-Grade Node.js: Re-building my backends from scratch to deeply understand concurrency, streaming, and security best practices.
  • UI/UX Principles & Design Systems: Learning the formal rules of design, typography, and interaction to make my personal projects (like Curiosity) as beautiful as they are functional.
